title: About
body:
Travel Massive is a global initiative to connect people in the travel industry locally, bringing together travel brands, travel startups, and travel bloggers and travel professionals.

We are run by a global team of organisers who run Travel Massive events in their cities.

Travel Massive is based on three key values:

  • Free to attend events
  • Open to all travel industry
  • Connect and share globally

Start a Travel Massive!

Connect with the movers and shakers of the online travel industry - start a Travel Massive in your city and help us build the world's biggest free and open travel networking group!

How to organise a Travel Massive meet up

title: Contacts
body:
Want to get in touch with Travel Massive? The best place to start is to contact an organiser in your city or a global team member in your region. If you have a general enquiry please email us at info@travelmassive.com and we'll forward it to the right person.

Global Team

  • Erika Helstrom (Global Co-ordinator)
  • Ian Cumming (Asia Pacific)
  • Alicia Smith (Asia Pacific)
  • Alicia Taggio (Canada/Americas East)
  • Mariellen Ward (Canada/Americas East)
  • Christina Tunnah (Americas West)
  • Michael Ball (UK / Europe)

Travel Massive Team

  • Website Co-ordinator (Ian Cumming)
  • Social Media Co-ordinator (Alicia Smith)
  • Event, Conference and Member listings (Erika Helstrom)
  • Blog Editor (Lois Yasay)

title: Help
body:
• Q: Where can I get a copy of the Travel Massive logo to put on my website?
    A: You can find our logo in different formats on our media page.

  • Q: Who started Travel Massive?
    A: Travel Massive (formerly Travel Tribe) was started in 2009 in Sydney, Australia by Ian Cumming and Alicia Smith, two newly-minted Sydneysiders looking to connect with other people in the local travel industry.It started as a casual meeting on a Sydney rooftop bar with a few others from the online travel industry, and within a few months the meetup had grown to a massive event at the Scary Canary bar in Sydney and was attracting international guests and travel CEOs.Alicia Taggio from Canada then started the meetup in her home town of Toronto... and Travel Massive started to spread around the world with the help of many other amazing people!

  • Q: Can I get a Travel Massive T-Shirt?
    A: We're working on getting T-shirts.. stay tuned!

  • Q: I already run a travel blogging meetup in my city, you're cramping my style!
    A: Travel Massive is more than just travel blogging - we're a group that is open to all members of the travel industry - including travel brands, travel agents, travel startups, photographers, people who want to get into the travel industry and people who generally just love travel. However, we are happy to discuss joining forces with your group, the more the merrier (this has worked really well for us in some of our cities already)!

  • Q: Why did the monkey get lost in the jungle?
    A: Because jungle is massive!
